content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a stone hoe, I need to craft dark oak planks, which require stripped dark oak wood. Therefore, I will move the stripped dark oak wood from slot 18 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: The dark oak planks have been crafted. I will now move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a stone hoe, I first need to craft a stick. A stick requires two planks, so I will move one plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have one plank in the crafting grid, I need another plank next to it. Therefore I will move another dark oak plank from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the sticks, I need to store them in the inventory. I will move all 4 sticks from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a stone hoe, I need to place 2 blackstone/cobblestone in the top row of the crafting table and then place a stick below them in the middle column. Therefore, I will start by moving the cobblestone from slot 32 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Since the cobblestone is in slot 1, I will place the blackstone to the right of it in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}]
thought: The top row is complete, so I will now move a stick into the middle column below the cobblestone and blackstone. This means moving it to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}]
thought: The crafting table is full, so I will move another stick into the middle column below the other stick. This means moving it to slot 8.
